details.title: Flight test evaluation of a 35 GHz forward looking altimeter for terrain avoidance
details.abstract: Honeywell has conducted a series of flight tests of a 35 GHz digital microprocessor controlled forward looking radar altimeter. A Bell 206L Jet Ranger helicopter was used to evaluate the capability of the sensor as a detector of various types of terrain collision hazards. The sensor was composed of a covert, spread spectrum radar altimeter processor driving a 35 GHz converter and antenna assembly mounted on a steerable platform. Excellent correlation between predicted performance and observed performance was obtained
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
